body:
I just upgraded to the latest version of Flutter:

Flutter 1.12.13+hotfix.5 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision 27321ebbad (23 hours ago) • 2019-12-10 18:15:01 -0800
Engine • revision 2994f7e1e6
Tools • Dart 2.7.0

And now when I click the Debug button to launch my app in and Android AVD I get hundreds of lines of errors in my console while the app is compiling, then later it installs just fine.

They look like old messages printed on the past days, I uninstalled my app and reinstalled but its the same, I am not even sure if this is a plugin issue or a flutter tool issue.

These are the messages (I am posting all of them, but github has a limit on how much to show, if you want them all, let me know and I will break them in several posts):

Also, either run the command

> flutter clean
> flutter run

Or from Android Studio use:

    Menu Tool > Flutter > Flutter Clean

Then check if rebuild works?
